alert.note: Alert for Clay; Knox; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 16 at 7:11PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected from mid-morning into the afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 45 to 60 mph possible from late Thursday afternoon into Thursday night. * WHERE...Whitley, Knox and Clay Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 4 PM EST Thursday. For the High Wind Watch, from late Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Scattered to widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
